a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD5DTRotavirusCILogic (IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotavirus contraindications) * Rule: Check for contraindications before administering the vaccine(s) due * Decision Table: Potential contraindications * Trigger: IMMZ.D5 Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications */ library IMMZD5DTRotavirusCILogic

def.name: Rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with prior history of intussusception.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccincation is contraindicated for clients with severe immunodeficiency, including severe combined immunodeficiency.

a:s.a:s: 'Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with prior history of intussusception.'
'Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccincation is contraindicated for clients with severe immunodeficiency, including severe combined immunodeficiency.'

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with prior history of intussusception.
Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccincation is contraindicated for clients with severe immunodeficiency, including severe combined immunodeficiency.

def.name: Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client had severe allergic reactions to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components. Check if the client has no known severe hypersensitivity to rotavirus vaccines components.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.

a:s.a:s: "Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 1"

'Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client had severe allergic reactions to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components. Check if the client has no known severe hypersensitivity to rotavirus vaccines components.'
"Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 2"
'Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.'

when.name: Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 1

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client had severe allergic reactions to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components. Check if the client has no known severe hypersensitivity to rotavirus vaccines components.

when.name: Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Case 2

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.

def.name: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Client has altered immunocompetence other than severe combined immunodeficiency, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Client has spina bifida, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Client has bladder exstrophy, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Client has chronic gastrointestinal disease, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Client has acute gastroenteritis, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider delaying rotavirus vaccination.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Client has moderate to severe fever, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider delaying rotavirus vaccination.
